{"id":941451605,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1682756243,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/941451605/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int myAtoi(String s) {\n        s = s.trim();\n        return helper(s, \"\", false, s.length());   \n    }\n\n    int helper(String up, String p, boolean isNegative, int len) {\n        if(up.isEmpty()) {\n            int ans = returnAns(isNegative, p);\n            return ans;\n        }\n\n        char ch = up.charAt(0);\n        if(p.length() <= 10) {\n            if(ch == '0' && p.length() == 0) {\n                 return helper(up.substring(1), p, isNegative, len);\n            } else if(ch == 45 && up.length() == len) {\n                isNegative = true;\n                // up = up.substring(1);\n                return helper(up.substring(1), p, isNegative, len);\n            } else if(ch == 43 && up.length() == len) {\n                // isNegative = true;\n                // up = up.substring(1);\n                return helper(up.substring(1), p, isNegative, len);\n            } else if(ch < 48 || ch > 57 && up.length() == len) {\n                // return 0;\n                return helper(\"\", p, isNegative, len);\n            } else if(ch < 48 || ch > 57 && up.length() != len) {\n                // int ans = returnAns(isNegative, p);\n                // return ans;    \n                return helper(\"\", p, isNegative, len);\n            }\n        } else {\n            // int ans = returnAns(isNegative, p);\n            // return ans;\n            return helper(\"\", p, isNegative, len);\n        }\n        // if(p.length() > 0);\n        // int temp = (int)((p.charAt(p.length()-1)) - '0');\n\n        return helper(up.substring(1), p + ch, isNegative, len);\n    }\n\n    int returnAns(boolean check, String p) {\n        \n        if(check) {\n            if(p.length() == 0) {\n                return 0;\n            } else if(p.length() <= 10) {\n                // return -(Integer.parseInt(p));\n                Long t = Long.parseLong(p);\n                return -(t.intValue());\n            } else {\n                return Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n            }\n        } else {\n            if(p.length() == 0) {\n                return 0;\n            } else if(p.length() <= 10) {\n                Long t = Long.parseLong(p);\n                return (t.intValue());\n                // return (Integer.parseInt(p));\n            } else {\n                return Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n            }\n        }\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
